mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LED_TEMPLATE_RELATION ( GLID, LEDID, MBID ) VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), #{ledid}, #{fqmbid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE LED_TEMPLATE_RELATION SET MBID = #{fqmbid} WHERE LEDID = #{ledid}
mapper.select: SELECT LEDTEMPREL.GLID AS "glid", LEDTEMPREL.LEDID AS "ledid", LEDTEMPREL.MBID AS "mbid", LEDLED.LEDMC AS "ledmc" FROM LED_TEMPLATE_RELATION ledTempRel JOIN led_led ledled ON LEDLED.LEDID = LEDTEMPREL.LEDID AND LEDTEMPREL.MBID = #{mbid} AND LEDTEMPREL.LEDID = #{ledid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LED_TEMPLATE_RELATION ( GLID, LEDID, MBID ) ( SELECT SYS_GUID (), #{map.ledid}, #{map.fqmbid} FROM DUAL )
mapper.delete: DELETE from LED_TEMPLATE_RELATION where LEDID IN #{item}
